} .woocommerce table.shop_attributes, .woocommerce-page table.shop_attributes { border: none; margin: 0 10% 0 10%; width: 80%%; background: #fff; } .woocommerce table.shop_attributes th, .woocommerce-page table.shop_attributes th { width: 35vw; font-weight: 400; padding: 8px 25px 8px 8px; border-top: 0; border-bottom: none; margin: 0; line-height: 1.5em; text-align: right; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: 0.5px; } .woocommerce table.shop_attributes td p, .woocommerce-page table.shop_attributes td p a { pointer-events: none; cursor: default; text-decoration: none; font-style: normal; font-size: 18px; color: #94948a; } @media screen and (min-width: 768px) { .single-product-info { width:100%; } }
